ComicInfo.Summary:
The battle you’ve waited for is finally here! With the deadly warrior assassin Capucine at long last facing her death, Etrigan the Demon arrives to collect her soul! But friends and allies are few and far between for Swamp Thing, and he’s not about to let an innocent spend eternity in Hell as the Demon’s plaything! Brutal action and painful goodbyes make this a must-read!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-19 06:51:45. [Issue ID 468867]

ComicInfo.Title: All Stories End, My Friend
